About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Meissa “Papa” Bayo and I was born in the West African country of Senegal. We gained our independence in 1960 from the French and our official religion is Islam. My country is known as the “gateway to Africa” and it is common knowledge that we are the gateway because of our “Teranga” which in our national language, Wolof, literally means to help a guest come ashore…Here is the story of my journey to Americas shores.
